nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Partly sunny, with a high near 90. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 74. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
